name: School/Romcom background/render pack
description: Compatible with other MAL Stylish themes. Build your own School Romcom on MyAnimeList pages with a variety of popular characters and backgrounds, like in the screenshot! Comes with 20 default choices to mix and match under Customize Settings, or you can use your own! See below for questions and other themes that customize MAL.
additional_info:
More backgrounds can be found here: http://imgur.com/a/P9BFr
More renders (characters) can be found here, without watermarks: http://imgur.com/a/ydViG
You can paste the URLs from the albums on this theme's page
